mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Shop Where flagUseable = 'yes' and (loginName = #{loginName} and loginPassword = PASSWORD(#{loginPassword})) LIMIT 1

SELECT Shop_Stock.*, Car_Model_Lv3.shortName as carModelLv3ShortName, Car_Model_Lv3.fullName as carModelLv3FullName, Car_Model_Lv3.FactoryPrice as FactoryPrice, Car_Model_Lv3.driveType as driveType, Car_Model_Lv3.gearType as gearType, (select colorCname from Dic_Color where Dic_Color.id = Shop_Stock.carOutsideColor) as carOutsideColorName, (select colorCname from Dic_Color where Dic_Color.id = Shop_Stock.carInsideColor) as carInsideColorName, Shop.shopName as shopName FROM Shop_Stock LEFT JOIN Car_Model_Lv3 ON Car_Model_Lv3.id = Shop_Stock.carModelLv3 LEFT JOIN Shop ON Shop.id = Shop_Stock.shop WHERE Car_Model_Lv3.carModelLv2 = #{carModelLv2Id}

SELECT Shop_Stock.*, Car_Model_Lv3.shortName as carModelLv3ShortName, Car_Model_Lv3.fullName as carModelLv3FullName, Car_Model_Lv3.FactoryPrice as FactoryPrice, Car_Model_Lv3.driveType as driveType, Car_Model_Lv3.gearType as gearType, (select colorCname from Dic_Color where Dic_Color.id = Shop_Stock.carOutsideColor) as carOutsideColorName, (select colorCname from Dic_Color where Dic_Color.id = Shop_Stock.carInsideColor) as carInsideColorName, Shop.shopName as shopName FROM Shop_Stock LEFT JOIN Car_Model_Lv3 ON Car_Model_Lv3.id = Shop_Stock.carModelLv3 LEFT JOIN Shop ON Shop.id = Shop_Stock.shop WHERE Shop_Stock.shop = #{shopId}
